page.title: 02Daily Routine of Brewham Boy
page.content:
A typical day in the life of{Keith Nye
Every morning I{get up}at about {7.30am,}rush downstairs and feed the dogs before I have{breakfast.}After breakfast I take our dog for a walk across the fields that almost surround our house and then go down to the bus stop to catch the{school bus.
When I reach{school}it is usually about{8.55 a.m.}and I play for five minutes before school starts.{Lunch break is between{12.15 p.m. and {1.30 p.m.}and school{finishes}at {3.30 p.m.
After school I go to{scouts}or to other various activities. Sometimes I go down into the village and{play with my friends.I watch the{television for a while and then go to{bed.
